statements: DELETE FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND access_level = 'admin';
DELETE FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE last_accessed < '2021-10-01' AND payment_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM access_control WHERE permission = 'admin' AND access_level = 3;
DELETE FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 3 AND permission = 'admin'
DELETE FROM BiometricData WHERE user_id = 2001 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM biometric_data WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
